co2.docs:
The configuration for the CO2 sensor. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [AMS iAQ-Core Indoor Air Quality Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/iaqcore.html#configuration-variables)*

tvoc.docs:
The configuration for the TVOC sensor. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [AMS iAQ-Core Indoor Air Quality Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/iaqcore.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [AMS iAQ-Core Indoor Air Quality Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/iaqcore.html#configuration-variables)*

i2c_id.docs:
**ID**: The id of the I²C Bus.

*See also: [AMS iAQ-Core Indoor Air Quality Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/iaqcore.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specifiy the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x5A`.

*See also: [AMS iAQ-Core Indoor Air Quality Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/iaqcore.html#configuration-variables)*
